Name: Battle of the Green Fork
attacker commander: Roose Bolton, Wylis Manderly, Medger Cerwyn, Harrion Karstark, Halys Hornwood
defender commander: Tywin Lannister, Gregor Clegane, Kevan Lannister, Addam Marbrand

Name: Battle of the Camps
attacker commander: Robb Stark, Tytos Blackwood, Brynden Tully

Name: Battle of the Stony Shore
note: Greyjoy's troop number based on the Battle of Deepwood Motte, in which Asha had 1000 soldier on 30 longships. That comes out to ~33 per longship. In the Battle of the Stony Shore, Theon has 8 longships, and just we can estimate that he has 8*33 =265 troops.

Name: Battle of Torrhen's Square
note: Greyjoy's troop number comes from the 264 estimate to have arrived on the stony shore minus the 20 Theon takes to attack Winterfell. Thus 264-20=244

Name: Battle of Winterfell
note: It isn't mentioned how many Stark men are left in Winterfell, other than "very few".

Name: Sack of Winterfell
defender commander: Rodrik Cassel, Cley Cerwyn, Leobald Tallhart
note: Since House Bolton betrays the Starks for House Lannister, we code this battle as between these two houses. Greyjoy men, numbering only 20, don't play a major part in the fighting and end up dying anyway.

Name: Battle of Oxcross
defender commander: Stafford Lannister, Roland Crakehall, Antario Jast

Name: Siege of Storm's End
defender commander: Renly Baratheon, Cortnay Penrose, Loras Tyrell, Randyll Tarly, Mathis Rowan

Name: Battle of the Fords
attacker commander: Tywin Lannister, Flement Brax, Gregor Clegane, Addam Marbrand, Lyle Crakehall, Leo Lefford
defender commander: Edmure Tully, Jason Mallister, Karyl Vance

Name: Sack of Harrenhal
attacker commander: Roose Bolton, Vargo Hoat, Robett Glover

Name: Battle of the Crag
attacker commander: Robb Stark, Smalljon Umber, Black Walder Frey

Name: Battle of the Blackwater
attacker commander: Stannis Baratheon, Imry Florent, Guyard Morrigen, Rolland Storm, Salladhor Saan, Davos Seaworth
defender commander: Tyrion Lannister, Jacelyn Bywater, Sandor Clegane, Tywin Lannister, Garlan Tyrell, Mace Tyrell, Randyll Tarly

Name: The Red Wedding
attacker commander: Walder Frey, Roose Bolton, Walder Rivers
note: This observation refers to the battle against the Stark men, not the attack on the wedding

Name: Battle of Castle Black
attacker commander: Mance Rayder, Tormund Giantsbane, Harma Dogshead, Magnar Styr, Varamyr
defender commander: Stannis Baratheon, Jon Snow, Donal Noye, Cotter Pyke

Name: Invasion of Ryamsport, Vinetown, and Starfish Harbor
Siege of Riverrun
attacker commander: Daven Lannister, Ryman Fey, Jaime Lannister
